column2: Hiya mister! Who are you? I'm Benji! We should be friends, Okay?
This is gross! Get it away from me!
My mom always says that I should say thank you after receiving a gift, even if I don't like it. So, uhh, thank you.
Oh wow this is neat! I can't wait to show Mom!
THIS IS AMAZING! Thank you so much!
Watch how fast I am! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOSH!
column3: Miss Sophia is kind and sweet, she really is the best!
column4: Tell me if you see any spiders..$I love spiders!
